centralized.title: Centralized
centralized.feature1: Completely free to play, no need to pay anything
centralized.feature2: You don't have to own any Web 3.0 wallet.
centralized.feature3: We store your password and username in our centralized database

profile.noChangeWarning: You won't be able to change your class or race once you proceed to create your hero
